data.title: Amar'e Stoudemire
data.meta_description: Get the latest amar'e stoudemire news, articles, videos and photos on the New York Post.
data.text:
Today’s Iconic Moment in New York Sports: Knicks, Amar’e Stoudemire agree to $100 million contract

July 5, 2010: The New York Knicks and free agent Amar’e Stoudemire agree to a five-year, $99.7 million contract.
